skills.name: TORTURE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Stun with each hit.
• Damage dealt increases based on the MAX HP of you and your enemy.

skills.name: RAVAGE
desc: • Deals 2 hits of physical damage to enemies.
• 30% Chance to Lower DEF of enemies.
• Damage increases the higher your SPECIAL stat.

skills.name: FIRST BLOOD
desc: Allies gain an extra turn if your team gets the first kill in a battle.
